mapper.select: select * from cs_info_hotword order by hot_id
mapper.delete: delete from cs_info_hotword where hot_id in (${hot_ids})
mapper.select: select * from cs_info_hotword where hot_id = #{hot_id}
mapper.insert: insert into cs_info_hotword(hot_id, hot_name, hot_url, app_id, site_id) values (#{hot_id},#{hot_name},#{hot_url},#{app_id},#{site_id})
mapper.select: select * from cs_info_hotword order by ${sort_name} ${sort_type} limit #{start_num,,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{page_size,,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select top ${page_size} * from cs_info_hotword
and hot_id not in (select top ${start_num} hot_id from cs_info_hotword order by ${sort_name} ${sort_type} ) order by ${sort_name} ${sort_type}
